attributes.action: Recognise athsma as a life threatening condition and as such provide free athsma medication for sufferers of the disease.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Presently, people with life long and life threatening illnesses get their prescriptions free.  Athsma is both life long and life threatening and yet we have to pay at least £6.75 per inhaler to survive.  I, for example, get through on average 6 a month, so you do the maths...
